#summary A better JFileChooser

The things that better than swing default JFileChooser

- A directory tree on the left
- A filter textbox on the upper-right corner

To use this dialog, just change your look and feel :
{{{
try {
    UIManager.setLookAndFeel("com.petersoft.white.PetersoftWhiteLookAndFeel");
} catch (Exception e) {
    e.printStackTrace();
}
}}}
